rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment contains explicit food safety assurance ('will not enter the food system') and describes background conditions ('rising inflation', 'supply chain issues').
This segment triggers Q5 (Reassuring) due to containment and food safety statement ("will not enter the food system"), skipping Q3.
States 'The culled birds will not enter the food system', which is a bare negation, not an explicit calming cue.
Segment does not contain a minimiser + scale contrast.
